Text: Wait. So is this the full game (the new one - 2013) or only addon? And if its only addon, where can I find full version?

@blue.dot no i am afraid this is only an add-on. We will have to wait for Skidrow to release the more up to date game. Although i do believe that tpb_4_ever has released a copy here http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7763198/Train_Simulator_2013_Deluxe_Plus
